categories: Category:Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds voice actors
Category:Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Charity James (born October 13, 1958) is a voice actress credited as providing additional voices to Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic and Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds. While left largely uncredited, she also voiced female Revan (taunts and replies in player's commands) in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic.

The daughter of a radio disk jockey named Raplh James, she learned to play the guitar starting from the age of eight. Her fist acting role was on General Hospital when she was in high school. Her first band, Bad Actor, became popular around this time and it was signed to Metal Blade Records. After starring in animated films, she started another group, Only Child, and won a Billboard Songwriter's Award. She has also done a lot of work in comedy, improvisational and scripted.
